channel.title: 667/704 Server Help
channel.description:
Hey guys
I need help with this source. someone released matrix version 4 source and client. The problem Im having is that when I go to wilderness, I cannot drink potions there. How do u fix that? What file do I go to and what do I change in that file?
Any help would be appreciated
Thx

item.title: 667/704 Server Help
item.dc:creator: @coolguy12123 coolguy12123
item.description:
@coolguy12123 wrote:

Any one else? Plz help!!

Read full topic

item.title: 667/704 Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Well, by default you’d drink potions anywhere unless it has set co-ords where you can drink it which I doubt so find the code which stops you drinking potions in the wilderness and remove it. Search relevent things in a logical pattern, sorry its very vague what I’m saying I only do 317 and i’m not even good at that haha

Read full topic
